english.inf_CurrentThumbnail: The current server thumbnail set is `%VAR%`
english.inf_ThumbnailChanged: Server thumbnail has been changed to `%VAR%`.
english.act_Date:
ﾠ
**Please enter the date.**

Format : dd/mm/yyyy
Exemple : 25/12/2021 (for 25 December 2021)

(cancel to stop)
english.act_Hour:
ﾠ
**Please enter the time.**

Format : hh:mm ou hhhmm
Exemple : 12:00 or 12h00

(cancel to stop)
english.act_Description:
ﾠ
**Please enter the description of the activity.** (Free text)

(cancel to stop)
english.act_NbParticipant:
ﾠ
**Maximum number of participants ?**

(cancel to stop)
english.act_Thumbnail:
ﾠ
**Use a thumbail ?**

:white_check_mark: - Yes
:x: - No
ﾠ
english.act_ThumbnailURL:
ﾠ
**Enter the valid URL of an image, or "default" to use the default thumbnail of the server.**

Default thumbnail : `%VAR%`
english.act_Image:
ﾠ
**Use an image ?**

:white_check_mark: - Yes
:x: - No
ﾠ
english.act_ImageURL:
ﾠ
**Enter the valid URL of an image, or "default" to use the default image of the server.**

Default image : `%VAR%`
english.act_ActivityFull:
%VAR%, The activity is full already.
Adding you as a reservist.
english.act_AddRemoveUserQuestion:
ﾠ
**Please tag the user to add/remove (@user).**
english.act_UserAdded: %VAR% has been added to the activity.
english.act_UserRemoved: %VAR% has been removed from the activity.
english.act_NotAuthor: Only the author or an administrator can perform this action.
english.err_BotOwner: You need to be the Bot Owner to run this command.
english.err_NoDm: Private messages are not taken into account.
english.err_CommandExecution: There was an error trying to execute that command!
english.err_MissingRole:
You must have one of the following roles to use this command :
%VAR%.
english.err_MissingBotPermission:
I am missing some permissions.
Please check the permissions I need to work properly :
%VAR%.
english.err_MissingPermission: You do not have permission to run this command.
english.err_MissingAdminPermission: You need Administrator permission to run this command.
english.err_LangNotSupported: That language is not supported yet.
english.err_InvalidURL: The URL you entered is not valid.
english.err_IncorrectDate: The date you entered is incorrect : %VAR%/%VAR%/%VAR%.
english.err_IncorrectTime: The time you entered is incorrect : %VAR%:%VAR%.
english.err_IncorrectNbParticipant: You entered an incorrect number of participants : %VAR%.

french.act_Date:
ﾠ
**A quelle date ?**

Format : jj/mm/aaaa
Exemple : 25/12/2021 (pour le 25 Décembre 2021)

(cancel pour annuler)
french.act_Hour:
ﾠ
**A quelle heure ?**

Format : hh:mm ou hhhmm
Exemple : 12:00 ou 12h00

(cancel pour annuler)
french.act_NbParticipant:
ﾠ
**Combien de participants au maximum ?**

(cancel pour annuler)
french.act_Thumbnail:
ﾠ
**Utiliser une miniature ?**

:white_check_mark: - Oui
:x: - Non
ﾠ
french.act_ThumbnailURL:
ﾠ
**Entrer l'URL valide d'une image, ou "default" pour la miniature par défaut du serveur.**

Default thumbnail : `%VAR%`
french.act_Image:
ﾠ
**Utiliser une image ?**

:white_check_mark: - Oui
:x: - Non
ﾠ
french.act_ImageURL:
ﾠ
**Entrer l'URL valide d'une image, ou "default" pour l'image par défaut du serveur.**

Default image : `%VAR%`
